sectionNotes: Restricted to College of Business. Restricted to students with Sophomore, Junior, or Senior class standing.
sectionText: Although creativity is widely touted as the last source of competitive advantage available to organizations, it is often very difficult to manage in a systematic way.  In light of this challenge, the aim of this course is to propose a framework in which creativity is a direct consequence of (1) the Person, (2) the Situation and (3) their Interaction.  This framework can be used to answer many important questions such as, ?Who are creative people?? and ?Where do they fit??
